title: MatchType
description: Survey details to match jobs across organization

surveyJobCode.description: The code which represents the survey job

surveyJobTitle.description: The title of the survey job

surveyJobDescription.description: A description of the survey job

matchPercent.description: A score provided by the person matching the employer job to the survey job for applicability: with 0% meaning no applicability and 100% meaning exact match

surveyJobCodeLevel.description: Code classifying the survey job code levels e.g., 1, 2, 3, 4

title.description: A title that describes the level of a survey job

description.description: A description of the level of a survey job

code.description: A code representing the level of a survey job

surveyJobCodeSpeciality.description: Code classifying the survey job code specialities e.g., 'Exec Comp', 'Cash Comp', 'Sales Comp', etc.

title.description: A title representing the specialization of a survey job

description.description: A description of the specialization of a survey job

code.description: A code representing the specialization of a survey job
